post-install-cmd: echo "Installing Okta Hosted Login Dependencies" && cd src && composer install
echo "Installing Resource Server Dependencies" && cd resource-server && composer install
post-update-cmd: echo "Updating Okta Hosted Login Dependencies" && cd src && composer update
echo "Updating Resource Server Dependencies" && cd resource-server && composer update
test:okta-hosted-login: npm run pretest && npm run test:okta-hosted-login
test:resource-server: npm run pretest && npm run test:resource-server
post-autoload-dump: echo "Dumping Okta Hosted Login Autoload" && cd src && composer dump-autoload
echo "Dumping Resource Server Autoload" && cd resource-server && composer dump-autoload
